name: Brain Driver
description:
WARNING: the game can take few minutes to load, sorry :(

Description:

Without spoiling too much of the story, this is a small and simple racing game taking place inside your mind. The controls may feel a bit slippery at first but they allow for amazing drifts. This game is available in French and English, select your preferred language on startup.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to steer, accelerate and brake. Enter and space are used to accept various prompts.

Credits:

Everything was created by me (sprites, code, music, ...). Except for a few sounds which were sampled and the font which can be found here.

Made as part of the Global Game Jam 2021
